LanguageData.MSImmunisation.label: Immunisation Injection
LanguageData.MSImmunisation.description: A dose of self injected chemicals designed to permanently stimulate the immunity system.
LanguageData.MSCerebrax.label: Cerebrax Injection
LanguageData.MSCerebrax.description: A dose of self injected chemicals designed to permanently remove psychic susceptability.
LanguageData.MSCondom.label: Condom
LanguageData.MSCondom.description: A condom is a sheath-shaped barrier device, used during sexual intercourse to reduce the probability of pregnancy or a sexually transmitted infection (STI). This version is a unisex version.
